Name: non-syndromic X-linked intellectual disability
Definition: A non-syndromic intellectual disability characterized by a X-linked inheritance pattern.

Name: autosomal dominant non-syndromic intellectual disability
Definition: A non-syndromic intellectual disability characterized by an autosomal dominant inheritance pattern.

Name: autosomal recessive non-syndromic intellectual disability
Definition: A non-syndromic intellectual disability characterized by an autosomal recessive inheritance pattern.
